Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.math

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.math.Vector
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class Vector extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an immutable 2D floating-point vector.
See Also:
